name: Discover India!
description:
Discover India

Discover India - A 3D game developed to ease out the burdens of learning the different features of a vast country like India. The game contains super-hot cars from Range Rover to Mercedes SLS Class.

This game is designed to provide the gamer

with a unique combination of gaming and

learning. Throughout the game you will be

experiencing the different conditions in India. From the chilling cold of Himalyas to the scorching heat of Indian Desert - experience it all.

After each time trial you complete, you will

have to pass a quiz to reach the next level to ensure that you not only enjoy the game but also learn a lot from it.

Hope you have fun!!

All the best!!
